profile.name: Jimmy Yan
profile.job: Full-stack Web Engineer, Revit Development Engineer, Tech Enthusiast, Xiaomi Fan
profile.aboutMe: I am a full-stack developer with a civil engineering background and experience in C# Revit plugin development. Now focused on web development, I work with Vue.js, NestJS, Prisma, and MySQL. I'm skilled in problem-solving, teamwork, and quick adaptation. Ready to contribute and grow in web development.

experience.description: At Fujian Zuohai Technology Co., Ltd., I serve as an R&D Engineer. My main responsibilities include secondary plugin development on platforms like Revit, CAD, and Tekla, automating architectural model processing and exporting model data. I am also responsible for developing web management platforms and integrating model data, developing both the front and back ends of MES and CRM platforms, visualizing and managing model data. The main technology stack includes Vue.js, Nest.js, Redis, and MySQL.

At the China State Construction Fourth Engineering Bureau Fuzhou Vanke Lanyue Garden project, I served as a Technician in the Engineering Management Department and as an on-site Construction Supervisor. My main tasks involved compiling construction plans, CAD drafting, BIM model creation, and managing on-site construction.

At the China Hydropower Seventh Engineering Bureau's Qianhai Sanxiao Project in Shenzhen and the North Line Water Diversion Project Safety Hazard Rectification Project in Shenzhen, I worked as a Technician in the Engineering Management Department and an on-site Construction Supervisor. My main responsibilities included scheduling construction plans in Project, compiling construction plans, company report materials, engineering quantity calculation, engineering measurement, design change compilation, on-site technical briefings, CAD drafting, and coordinating external land acquisitions.

project.name: MES Intelligent Manufacturing Platform
project.description: A platform managing component production, warehousing, logistics, and installation, optimizing communication and production management.

project.name: CRM Customer Marketing Platform
project.description: A CRM solution for managing leads, customers, projects, contracts, and payments, enhancing business-customer relationships.

project.name: Revit Aluminum Formwork Design System
project.description: A Revit plugin for automating aluminum formwork design, supporting modeling, drawing export, BOM, and platform integration.
